properties.name: --mdc-button-horizontal-padding
properties.description: Left and right padding of the button label (for outlined buttons the outline width is automatically subtracted).

properties.name: --mdc-button-outline-width
properties.description: `width` of the outline of an outlined button and attempts to keep the component size constant.

properties.name: --mdc-button-outline-color
properties.description: Color of the outline of an outlined element.

properties.name: --mdc-button-disabled-fill-color
properties.description: Background fill color of a disabled raised or unelevated button.

properties.name: --mdc-button-disabled-ink-color
properties.description: Text color of a disabled button as well as the outline color of a disabled outlined button.

properties.name: --mdc-button-disabled-outline-color
properties.description: Sets the color of the outline of a disabled outlined button.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-hover
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when focused or hovered.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-focus
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when focused. Note, if button is both focused and hovered, then hover will override focus box-shadow.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-active
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when active.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-disabled
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-linear-progress-buffer-color
properties.description:
Sets the color of the buffer progress bar.
**NOTE:** to change the color of the buffering dots, you must do so in the image of `--mdc-linear-progress-buffering-dots-image`.

properties.name: --mdc-linear-progress-buffering-dots-image
properties.description: Sets the image to use as the buffering dots. This pattern is then repeated horizontally and animated.

properties.name: --mdc-radio-unchecked-color
properties.description: Color of the ring of an unchecked radio.

properties.name: --mdc-radio-disabled-color
properties.description: Color of the ring and circle of a disabled radio.

properties.name: --mdc-top-app-bar-fixed-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the fixed top app bar when scrolling.

properties.name: --mdc-top-app-bar-width
properties.description: Width of the `top-app-bar` in relation to the Window.

properties.name: --mdc-snackbar-action-color
properties.description: Color of the action button text.

properties.name: --mdc-top-app-bar-width
properties.description: Width of the `top-app-bar` in relation to the Window.

properties.name: --mdc-icon-button-size
properties.description: Sets the size of the button wrapping the icon.

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-filled-border-radius
properties.description: Border radius of the standard / filled textarea's background filling.

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-outlined-idle-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textarea's outline when idle.

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-outlined-hover-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textarea's outline when hovering.

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-outlined-disabled-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textarea's outline when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-primary
properties.description: Color of a floating, slotted `FloatingLabel` and outline.

properties.name: --mdc-shape-small
properties.description: Radius of the border.

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-stroke-width
properties.description: Outline width.

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-notch-offset
properties.description: Padding-top to apply to notch when open to compensate for border width box size

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-border-color
properties.description: Sets the border / outline color.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-filled-border-radius
properties.description: Border radius of the standard / filled textfield's background filling.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-idle-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled textfield's bottom line when idle.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-hover-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled textfield's bottom line when hovering.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled textfield's bottom line when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-idle-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when idle.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-hover-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when hovering.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-disabled-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the textfield's background fill (non-outlined).

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the textfield's background fill (non-outlined) when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the input text.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-label-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the non-focused floating label, helper text, char counter, and placeholder.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the input text, the floating label, helper text, char counter, and placeholder of a disabled textfield.

properties.name: --mdc-drawer-width
properties.description: Width of the side drawer when opened.

properties.name: --mdc-list-vertical-padding
properties.description: Padding before and after the first and last list items.

properties.name: --mdc-list-side-padding
properties.description: Adjusts the padding of the `[padded]` list dividers (also propagates to `mwc-list-item`).

properties.name: --mdc-list-inset-margin
properties.description: Adjusts the left inset padding of an `[inset]` list divider. Typically used for dividing list items with icons.

properties.name: --mdc-list-side-padding
properties.description: Side padding of the list item.

properties.name: --mdc-list-item-meta-size
properties.description: Line height of the meta icon or text and width & height of the slotted parent wrapper.

properties.name: --mdc-list-item-graphic-size
properties.description: Line height of the graphic and width & height of the slotted parent wrapper. `24px` when graphic is `"icon"`. `40px` when graphic is `"avatar"`. `56px` when graphic is `"medium"`, and `"large"`.

properties.name: --mdc-list-item-graphic-margin
properties.description: Margin between the text and graphic. `16px` when graphic is `"avatar"`, `"medium"`, `"large"`, and `"control"`. `32px` when graphic is `"icon"`.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-item-height
properties.description: Height of single-line list-items in the menu.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-min-width
properties.description: Menu min-width.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-max-width
properties.description: Menu max-width.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-max-height
properties.description: Menu max-height.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-z-index
properties.description: Z-index of the popup menu surface.
